attributes.action: Sm1 - Change how Sutton Council are dealing with there communitie
attributes.additional_details:
Let the people be the background, information, evidence, references
This is a sad state of affairs as children parents homes olderly people are being neglected taken advantaged of and lied about and lied to. 
Let the people make Sutton Council a better system.
attributes.background:
Sutton council -
I want to Make a petition on behalf of the community to give them a opportunity to speak out and put out how they have been wrongly treated and neglected by Sutton council system. As a community we deserve a say we deserve to be heard not ignored.

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of your local council

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you.

You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
